profile_picture_is_managed_by_ldap_serve: Profil resmi LDAP sunucusu tarafından yönetilmektedir ve burada değiştirilemez.
click_profile_picture_to_upload_custom: Özel bir resim yüklemek için profil resmine tıklayın.
image_should_be_in_format: Resim PNG veya JPEG formatın’da olmalıdır.
create_a_login_code_to_sign_in_without_a: Kullanıcının bir kez parolasız oturum açmak için kullanabileceği bir giriş kodu oluşturun.
name: İsim
this_browser_does_not_support_passkeys: Bu tarayıcı geçiş anahtarlarını desteklemiyor. Lütfen alternatif bir oturum açma yöntemi kullanın.
authenticator_does_not_support_discovera: Kimlik doğrulayıcı, keşfedilebilir kimlik bilgilerini desteklemiyor
passkey_was_previously_registered: Bu geçiş anahtarı daha önce kaydedilmiştir
authenticator_does_not_support_any_of_th: Kimlik doğrulayıcı, talep edilen algoritmalardan hiçbirini desteklemiyor
critical_error_occurred_contact_administ: Kritik bir hata oluştu. Lütfen sistem yöneticinizle iletişime geçin.
do_you_want_to_sign_in_to_client_with_yo: {appName} hesabınla {client} uygulamasına giriş yapmak istiyor musun?
do_you_want_to_sign_out_of_pocketid_with: {username} adlı hesapla {appName} uygulamasından çıkış yapmak istiyor musun?
authenticate_with_passkey_to_access_acco: Hesabınıza erişmek için geçiş anahtarınızla kimlik doğrulaması yapın.
if_you_do_not_have_access_to_your_passke: Geçiş anahtarınıza erişiminiz yoksa, aşağıdaki yöntemlerden biriyle giriş yapabilirsiniz.
enter_a_login_code_to_sign_in: Giriş yapmak için bir kod girin.
an_email_has_been_sent_to_the_provided_e: Verilen e-posta adresine, sistemde mevcutsa bir e-posta gönderilmiştir.
enter_your_email_address_to_receive_an_e: Giriş kodunu içeren bir e-posta almak için e-posta adresinizi girin.
enter_the_code_you_received_to_sign_in: Aldığınız kodu girin ve giriş yapın.
profile_picture_updated_successfully: Profil resmi başarıyla güncellendi. Güncellenmesi birkaç dakika sürebilir.
please_provide_a_passkey_to_prevent_losi: Hesabınıza erişimi kaybetmemek için lütfen bir geçiş anahtarı ekleyin.
it_is_recommended_to_add_more_than_one_p: Birden fazla geçiş anahtarı eklemeniz önerilir, böylece hesabınıza erişimi kaybetmezsiniz.
manage_your_passkeys_that_you_can_use_to: Kendinizi doğrulamak için kullanabileceğiniz geçiş anahtarlarınızı yönetin.
create_a_one_time_login_code_to_sign_in_: Geçiş anahtarı olmadan farklı bir cihazdan giriş yapmak için tek kullanımlık bir giriş kodu oluşturun.
username_can_only_contain: Kullanıcı adı yalnızca küçük harfler, sayılar, alt çizgiler, noktalar, tireler ve '@' sembolleri içerebilir
username_must_start_with: Kullanıcı adı bir harf veya sayısal karakterle başlamalıdır
username_must_end_with: Kullanıcı adı bir harf veya sayısal karakterle bitmelidir
sign_in_using_the_following_code_the_cod: Aşağıdaki kodu kullanarak giriş yapın. Kod 15 dakika içinde süresi dolacaktır.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_pas: Bu geçiş anahtarını silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?
name_your_passkey_to_easily_identify_it_: Name your passkey to easily identify it later.
add_a_new_api_key_for_programmatic_acces: Add a new API key for programmatic access to the <link href='https://pocket-id.org/docs/api'>Pocket ID API</link>.
for_security_reasons_this_key_will_only_: For security reasons, this key will only be shown once. Please store it securely.
name_to_identify_this_api_key: Name to identify this API key.
when_this_api_key_will_expire: When this API key will expire.
optional_description_to_help_identify_th: Optional description to help identify this key's purpose.
expiration_date_must_be_in_the_future: Expiration date must be in the future
are_you_sure_you_want_to_revoke_the_api_: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key "{apiKeyName}"? This will break any integrations using this key.
configure_smtp_to_send_emails: Enable email notifications to alert users when a login is detected from a new device or location.
configure_ldap_settings_to_sync_users_an: Configure LDAP settings to sync users and groups from an LDAP server.
you_have_to_save_the_changes_before_send: You have to save the changes before sending a test email. Do you want to save now?
test_email_sent_successfully: Test email sent successfully to your email address.
failed_to_send_test_email: Failed to send test email. Check the server logs for more information.
this_can_be_useful_for_selfsigned_certif: This can be useful for self-signed certificates.
send_an_email_to_the_user_when_they_log_: Send an email to the user when they log in from a new device.
emai_login_code_requested_by_user: Email Login Code Requested by User
allow_users_to_sign_in_with_a_login_code: Allows users to bypass passkeys by requesting a login code sent to their email. This significantly reduces security as anyone with access to the user's email can gain entry.
allows_an_admin_to_send_a_login_code_to_: Allows an admin to send a login code to the user via email.
the_duration_of_a_session_in_minutes_bef: The duration of a session in minutes before the user has to sign in again.
whether_the_users_should_be_able_to_edit: Whether the users should be able to edit their own account details.
whether_the_users_email_should_be_marked: Whether the user's email should be marked as verified for the OIDC clients.
the_search_filter_to_use_to_search_or_sy: The Search filter to use to search/sync users.
The Search filter to use to search/sync groups.
the_value_of_this_attribute_should_never: The value of this attribute should never change.
the_value_of_this_attribute_can_either_b: The value of this attribute can either be a URL, a binary or a base64 encoded image.
the_attribute_to_use_for_querying_member: The attribute to use for querying members of a group.
members_of_this_group_will_have_admin_pr: Members of this group will have Admin Privileges in Pocket ID.
admins_have_full_access_to_the_admin_pan: Admins have full access to the admin panel.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
manage_which_groups_this_user_belongs_to: Manage which groups this user belongs to.
custom_claims_are_key_value_pairs_that_c: Custom claims are key-value pairs that can be used to store additional information about a user. These claims will be included in the ID token if the scope 'profile' is requested.
create_a_new_group_that_can_be_assigned_: Create a new group that can be assigned to users.
name_that_will_be_displayed_in_the_ui: Name that will be displayed in the UI
name_that_will_be_in_the_groups_claim: Name that will be in the "groups" claim
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user group?
custom_claims_are_key_value_pairs_that_c: Custom claims are key-value pairs that can be used to store additional information about a user. These claims will be included in the ID token if the scope 'profile' is requested. Custom claims defined on the user will be prioritized if there are conflicts.
add_a_new_oidc_client_to_appname: Add a new OIDC client to {appName}.
use_this_link_to_sign_in_once: Use this link to sign in once. This is needed for users who haven't added a passkey yet or have lost it.
public_clients_description: Public clients do not have a client secret. They are designed for mobile, web, and native applications where secrets cannot be securely stored.
public_key_code_exchange_is_a_security_f: Public Key Code Exchange is a security feature to prevent CSRF and authorization code interception attacks.
requires_users_to_authenticate_again_on_: Requires users to authenticate again on each authorization, even if already signed in
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_oid: Are you sure you want to delete this OIDC client?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_create_a_new_cl: Are you sure you want to create a new client secret? The old one will be invalidated.
add_user_groups_to_this_client_to_restri: Add user groups to this client to restrict access to users in these groups. If no user groups are selected, all users will have access to this client.
this_will_remove_the_uploaded_image_and_: This will remove the uploaded image and reset the profile picture to default. Do you want to continue?
profile_picture_has_been_reset: Profile picture has been reset. It may take a few minutes to update.
select_the_language_you_want_to_use: Select the language you want to use. Please note that some text may be automatically translated and could be inaccurate.
contribute_to_translation: If you find an issue you're welcome to contribute to the translation on <link href='https://crowdin.com/project/pocket-id'>Crowdin</link>.
see_all_account_activities_from_the_last: See all user activity for the last 3 months.
turn_off_ui_animations: Turn off animations throughout the UI.
disabled_users_cannot_log_in_or_use_serv: Disabled users cannot log in or use services.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_disable_this_us: Are you sure you want to disable this user? They will not be able to log in or access any services.
ldap_soft_delete_users_description: When enabled, users removed from LDAP will be disabled rather than deleted from the system.
login_code_email_success: The login code has been sent to the user.
callback_url_description: URL(s) provided by your client. Will be automatically added if left blank. Wildcards (*) are supported, but best avoided for better security.
logout_callback_url_description: URL(s) provided by your client for logout. Wildcards (*) are supported, but best avoided for better security.
send_an_email_to_the_user_when_their_api: Send an email to the user when their API key is about to expire.
enter_code_displayed_in_previous_step: Enter the code that was displayed in the previous step.
federated_client_credentials_description: Using federated client credentials, you can authenticate OIDC clients using JWT tokens issued by third-party authorities.
preview_the_oidc_data_that_would_be_sent: Preview the OIDC data that would be sent for different users
Preview the OIDC data that would be sent for this user
select_an_accent_color_to_customize_the_: Select an accent color to customize the appearance of Pocket ID.
custom_accent_color_description: Enter a custom color using valid CSS color formats (e.g., hex, rgb, hsl).
create_a_signup_token_to_allow_new_user_: Create a signup token to allow new user registration.
number_of_times_token_can_be_used: Number of times the signup token can be used.
configure_user_creation: Manage user creation settings, including signup methods and default permissions for new users.
user_creation_groups_description: Assign these groups automatically to new users upon signup.
user_creation_claims_description: Assign these custom claims automatically to new users upon signup.
signup_disabled_description: User signups are completely disabled. Only administrators can create new user accounts.
signup_requires_valid_token: A valid signup token is required to create an account
create_your_account_to_get_started: Create your account to get started.
initial_account_creation_description: Please create your account to get started. You will be able to set up a passkey later.
create_a_passkey_to_securely_access_your: Create a passkey to securely access your account. This will be your primary way to sign in.
enable_user_signups_description: Decide how users can sign up for new accounts in Pocket ID.
view_and_manage_active_signup_tokens: View and manage active signup tokens.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_sig: Are you sure you want to delete this signup token? This action cannot be undone.
signup_with_token_description: Users can only sign up using a valid signup token created by an administrator.
signup_open_description: Anyone can create a new account without restrictions.
skip_passkey_setup_description: It's highly recommended to set up a passkey because without one, you will be locked out of your account as soon as the session expires.
contact_your_administrator_for_app_acces: Contact your administrator to get access to applications.
client_launch_url_description: The URL that will be opened when a user launches the app from the My Apps page.
client_name_description: The name of the client that shows in the Pocket ID UI.
revoke_access_description: Revoke access to {clientName}. {clientName} will no longer be able to access your account information.
revoke_access_successful: The access to {clientName} has been successfully revoked.
invalid_client_id: Client ID can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
custom_client_id_description: Set a custom client ID if this is required by your application. Otherwise, leave it blank to generate a random one.
group_rdn_attribute_description: The attribute used in the groups distinguished name (DN).
ui_config_disabled_info_description: The UI configuration is disabled because the application configuration settings are managed through environment variables. Some settings may not be editable.
logo_from_url_description: Paste a direct image URL (svg, png, webp). Find icons at <link  href="https://selfh.st/icons">Selfh.st Icons</link> or <link href="https://dashboardicons.com">Dashboard Icons</link>.
require_user_email_description: Requires users to have an email address. If disabled, the users without an email address won't be able to use features that require an email address.
